thread.title: Emmaus' Alicia Cooperman is lehighvalleylive Field Hockey Player of the Week
thread.title_full: Emmaus' Alicia Cooperman is lehighvalleylive Field Hockey Player of the Week

title: Emmaus' Alicia Cooperman is lehighvalleylive Field Hockey Player of the Week
text:
Senior Alicia Cooperman had a productive week for the Emmaus field hockey team. (lehighvalleylive.com file photo) By Tom Hinkel | For lehighvalleylive.com on October 15, 2015 9:38 AM 
FIELD HOCKEY PLAYER OF THE WEEK Alicia Cooperman (Tom Hinkel | For lehighvalleylive.com) 
Alicia Cooperman , Emmaus 
Cooperman, a senior midfielder, tallied six goals and four assists in the Green Hornets' 4-0 week. 
She produced three goals and an assist in an 11-0 romp over Nazareth, netted two goals and an assist in a 9-1 pasting of Northampton, and followed with a goal and two assists in a 6-1 triumph over Hazleton. 
Cooperman had 8 goals and 18 assists through 15 games this season. 
Honorable mention : Sr. F Maddi Donatelli , Freedom; Jr. M Anissa Abboud , Liberty; So. M Olivia Sahaydak , Liberty; Jr. M Cheyenne Ott , Bangor; Jr. F Mayv Clune , Moravian Academy; Sr. M Dana Evans , Pen Argyl; Sr. F Cheyenne Mazzocca , Northern Lehigh; So. F Meghan Reese , Southern Lehigh; Sr. Ellie Zgoda , Phillipsburg; Jr. F Dani Profita , Warren Hills; Sr. M Katie Thompson , Warren Hills; Jr. F Molly Gorczyca , Hackettstown; Sr. F Kayli Yeisley , Hackettstown
